Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
ModuleDescription:
Students will design, develop and implement a musicrelated
project that demonstrates their musical and
organisational capacities. Students are required to
incorporate planning and resource strategies to produce a
small-scale production, performance or community project.
Prerequisite:
Students must either be enrolled as Majors in Music & Society,
and Music, Collaboration & Production or to have declared the
major areas as a second major in relation to their principal
degree
